alerts.title: Urgent Flood Warning in Fangak County
alerts.details: Heavy rains have caused the Nile to overflow. Evacuate to higher ground immediately. Aid stations are being set up in Old Fangak.

alerts.title: Cholera Outbreak Reported in Leer Town
alerts.details: Boil all drinking water. MSF has opened a treatment center near the main market. Practice hand washing.

alerts.title: WFP Food Distribution in Bentiu PoC Site
alerts.details: Distribution begins tomorrow at 9 AM at Sector 2. Please bring your registration card.
